body.raw: {    "method": "ModifyAccount",    "params": {        "accountID": <Account ID>,        "username": "<Optional New Username>",        "status": "<Optional Account Status>",        "initiatorSecret": "<Optional Initiator Secret>",        "targetSecret": "<Optional Target Secret>",        "attributes": {}    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "AddClusterAdmin",    "params": {        "username": "<Cluster Admin Username>",        "password": "<Cluster Admin Password>",        "access": [<CSV list of quoted access levels or "administrator" for all>],        "acceptEula": true,        "attributes": {}    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "AddLdapClusterAdmin",    "params": {        "username": "<Cluster Admin Full Distinguished Name or Group Name from LDAP Server>",        "access": [<CSV list of quoted access levels or "administrator" for all>],        "acceptEula": true,        "attributes": {}    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "ModifyClusterAdmin",    "params": {        "clusterAdminID": <Cluster Admin ID>,        "access": [<CSV list of quoted access levels or "administrator" for all>],        "password": "<Optional Cluster Admin Password>"    },    "id": 1}

request.description: Enable cluster features that are disabled by default.
Retrieve the status of a cluster feature.

body.raw: {    "method": "ModifyClusterFullThreshold",    "params": {        "stage2AwareThreshold": <Number of Nodes of Capacity Remaining Before Warning>,        "stage3BlockThresholdPercent": <Percentage of Block Storage Usage Below the Error Threshold Before Warning>,        "maxMetadataOverProvisionFactor": <Optional Metadata Multiplier Times Actual Space Available>    },    "id": 1}
{    "method": "SetLoginBanner",    "params": {        "banner": "<Optional login/terms of use banner message>",        "enabled": <Optional boolean true or false>    },    "id": 1}
{    "method": "SetNtpInfo",    "params": {        "servers": [<CSV List of Quoted NTP Servers>],        "broadcastclient": <Boolean true or false>    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "SetSnmpInfo",    "params": {        "networks": [            {                "community": "<SNMP Community String>",                "access": "<Access Level>",                "network": "<A.B.C.D Network Address>",                "cidr": <Integer Representation of CIDR Netmask>            },            {                "<Optional Additional SNMP Network Object>"            }        ],        "usmUsers": [            {                "access": "<Access Level>",                "name": "<SNMP User Name>",                "passphrase": "<SNMP User Passphrase>",                "password": "<SNMP User Password>",                "secLevel": "<Security Level>"            }        ],        "enabled": <Boolean true or false>,        "snmpV3Enabled": <Boolean true or false>    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "SetRemoteLoggingHosts",    "params": {        "remoteHosts": [            {                "host": "<IP Address of Remote Logging Host>",                "port": <Remote Logging Port Number>            },            {                "host": "<Optional IP Address of Remote Logging Host>",                "port": <Optional Remote Logging Port Number>            }        ]    },    "id": 1}
{    "method": "Shutdown",    "params": {        "nodes": [<CSV List of Node IDs>],        "option": "<Either halt or restart>"    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "CreateCluster",    "params": {        "acceptEula": true,        "mvip": "<Cluster MVIP>",        "svip": "<Cluster SVIP>",        "repCount": 2,        "username": "<Cluster Admin Username>",        "password": "<Cluster Admin Password>",        "attributes": {},        "nodes": [<CSV List of Quoted Node Storage IP Addresses>]    },    "id": 1}

request.description: Retrieve high-level activity measurements for multiple drives in the cluster.

body.raw: {    "method": "RemoveDrives",    "params": {        "drives": [<CSV List of Drive IDs>],        "forceDuringBinSync": <Optional boolean true or false>    },    "id": 1}

{
    "method": "EnableLdapAuthentication",
    "params": {
        "authType": "SearchAndBind",
        "groupSearchBaseDN": "<Base Distinguished Name for Group Search>",
        "groupSearchType": "ActiveDirectory",
        "searchBindDN": "<Read Only LDAP Account Distinguished Name>",
        "searchBindPassword": "<Read Only LDAP Account Password>",
        "userSearchBaseDN": "<Base Distinguished Name for User Search>",
        "userSearchFilter": "(&(objectClass=person)(sAMAccountName=%USERNAME%))",
        "serverURIs": [
            "<LDAP Server 1 - IP Address>",
            "<LDAP Server 2 - IP Address>",
            "<LDAP Server 3 - IP Address>",
            "<LDAP Server 4 - IP Address>"
        ]
    },
    "id": 1
}

{    "method": "CreateClusterSupportBundle",    "params": {        "mvip": "<MVIP of Cluster - Either mvip or nodes is required>",        "nodes": "<CSV List of Node IP Addresses>",        "username": "<Cluster Admin Username>",        "password": "<Cluster Admin Password>",        "allowIncomplete": <Optional Boolean true or false>,        "bundleName": "<Optional Custom name for the support bundle>",        "extraArgs": "<Optional additional arguments>"    },    "id": 1}
{    "method": "AddNodes",    "params": {        "pendingNodes": [<CSV List of Pending Node IDs>],        "autoInstall" : <Optional boolean true or false>    },    "id": 1}

request.description: List all nodes in the cluster that are currently in the PendingActive state.

body.raw: {    "method": "CreateSupportBundle",    "params": {        "bundleName": "<Optional custom name for the support bundle>",        "extraArgs": "<Optional additional arguments>",        "timeoutSec": <Optional timeout for the support bundle process in seconds>    },    "id": 1}

request.description: Return hardware information and status for a single node.

body.raw: {    "method": "ResetNode",    "params": {        "force": true,        "build": "<Optional URL of image to build>",        "options": {<Optional options to pass to the reset operation>}    },    "id": 1}
{    "method": "SetClusterConfig",    "params": {        "cluster": {<JSON Object Indicating Parameters to be Changed>}    },    "id": 1}
{    "method": "SetConfig",    "params": {        "config": {<JSON Object Indicating Parameters to be Changed>}    },    "id": 1}
{    "method": "SetNetworkConfig",    "params": {        "network": {<JSON Object Indicating Parameters to be Changed>}    },    "id": 1}
{    "method": "TestConnectEnsemble",    "params": {        "ensemble": "<Optional CSV list of Node Cluster IPs>"    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "TestPing",    "params": {        "attempts": <Number of Pings to Attempt>,        "hosts": "<CSV List of IP Addresses>",        "totalTimeoutSec": <Test Timeout in Sec>,        "packetSize": <Ping Packet Size in Bytes>,        "pingTimeoutMSec": <Per Ping Timeout in MSec>,        "prohibitFragmentation": <Boolean true or false to set the DF flag>    },    "id": 1}

request.description: List the results of all currently running and completed asynchronous methods on the system.

body.raw: {    "method": "CancelClone",    "params": {        "cloneID": <Clone ID for the Ongoing Clone Process>    },    "id": 1}
{    "method": "CancelGroupClone",    "params": {        "groupCloneID": <Group Clone ID for the Ongoing Group Clone Process>    },    "id": 1}

request.description: Stop an ongoing clone process for a group of volumes.

body.raw: {    "method": "CloneMultipleVolumes",    "params": {        "volumes": [            {                "volumeID": <Volume ID>                "name": "<Optional Clone Volume Name>",                "access": "<Optional Clone Volume Access Level>",                "newAccountID": "<Optional New Account ID>",                "newSize": "<Optional New Clone Volume Size in Bytes>",                "attributes": {}            },            {                "volumeID": <Volume ID>            },            {                "volumeID": <Volume ID>            }        ],        "access": "<Optional Clone Volume Access Level>",        "groupSnapshotID": <Optional Group Snapshot to be used as the source for the clone>,        "newAccountID": <Optional ID of the Account for the new clone volumes>    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "CloneVolume",    "params": {        "volumeID": <Volume ID>,        "name": "<Name of New Cloned Volume>",        "newAccountID": <Optional New Account ID>,        "newSize": <Optional New Size in Bytes>,        "access": "<Optional Access Level>",        "snapshotID": <Optional ID of the Snapshot to be Used>,        "attributes": {}    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "CopyVolume",    "params": {        "dstVolumeID": <VolumeID of the Volume to Overwrite>,        "volumeID": <VolumeID of the volume to be read from>,        "snapshotID": <Optional ID of the Snapshot to use as Source of the Copy>    },    "id": 1}

request.description: Overwrite the data contents of one volume with the data contents of another volume.

body.raw: {    "method": "CreateGroupSnapshot",    "params": {        "volumes": [<CSV List of Volume IDs>],        "name": "<Optional Group Snapshot Name>",        "enableRemoteReplication": <Optional Boolean true or false>,        "retention": "<Optional amount of time to retain the snapshot in HH:mm:ss>",        "attributes": {}    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "CreateInitiators",    "params": {        "initiators": [        	{        		"name": "<IQN or WWPN of Initiator to Create>",            	"alias": "<Optional Friendly Name for Initiator>",            	"volumeAccessGroupID": <Optional ID of Destination VAG for Initiator>,            	"attributes": {}            }        ]    },    "id": 1}

request.description: Create multiple new iSCSI or Fibre Channel initiators.

body.raw: {    "method": "CreateQoSPolicy",    "params": {        "name": "<Name of QoS Policy>",        "qos": {            "minIOPS": <Minimum IOPS>,            "maxIOPS": <Maximum IOPS>,            "burstIOPS": <Burst IOPS>        }    },    "id": 1}

request.description: Create multiple new iSCSI or Fibre Channel initiators.

body.raw: {    "method": "CreateSchedule",    "params": {        "attributes": {            "frequency": "<One of: Time Interval, Days of Week or Days of Month>"        },        "hours": <Optional Hours between snapshots, used for Time Interval mode>,        "minutes": <Optional Minutes between snapshots, used for Time Interval mode>,        "paused": <Optional Boolean true or false>,        "recurring": <Optional Boolean true or false>,        "scheduleName": "<Name for the schedule>",        "scheduleType": "snapshot",        "scheduleInfo": {            "volumeID": <Volume ID to be snapped>,            "volumes": [<CSV List of Volume IDs to be group snapped>],            "name": "<Name of the snapshot>",            "enableRemoteReplication": <Boolean true or false>            "retention": "<Optional amount of time to retain the snapshot in HH:mm:ss>"        },        "startingDate": "<Optional Starting Date in ISO 8601 Format>",        "monthdays": [<Optional CSV List of days to run>],        "weekdays": [            {"day": <Day Number>, "offset": 1},            {"day": <Day Number>, "offset": 1}        ]    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "CreateSnapshot",    "params": {        "volumeID": <Volume ID>,        "snapshotID": <Optional Source Snapshot ID>,        "name": <Optional Snapshot Name>,        "enableRemoteReplication": <Optional Boolean true or false>,        "retention": "<Optional amount of time to retain the snapshot in HH:mm:ss>"        "attributes": {}    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "CreateStorageContainer",    "params": {        "name": "<Name of new Storage Container>",        "accountID": <Optional ID of Account to Assign to Storage Container>,        "initiatorSecret": "<Optional CHAP Secret for Initiator>",        "targetSecret": "<Optional CHAP Secret for Target>"    },    "id": 1}

request.description: Create a Virtual Volume storage container.

body.raw: {    "method": "CreateVolume",    "params": {        "name": "<Volume Name>",        "accountID": <Account ID>,        "totalSize": <Volume Size in Bytes>,        "enable512e": <Optional Boolean true or false>,        "attributes": {},        "qos": {            "minIOPS": <Optional Minimum IOPS>,            "maxIOPS": <Optional Maximum IOPS>,            "burstIOPS": <Optional Burst IOPS>,            "burstTime": 60        },        "qosPolicyID": <Optional QoS Policy ID>    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "CreateVolumeAccessGroup",    "params": {        "name": "<Volume Access Group Name>",        "initiators": [<CSV List of Initiator IDs (integers) or Quoted IQNs or WWPNs (strings, deprecated)>],        "volumes": [<CSV List of Volume IDs>],        "attributes": {}    },    "id": 1}

request.description: Delete one or more initiators from the system.
Delete one or more initiators from the system.

body.raw: {    "method": "DeleteStorageContainers",    "params": {        "storageContainerIDs": [<CSV List of Storage Container IDs to Delete>]    },    "id": 1}

request.description: Remove one or more Virtual Volume storage containers from the system.

body.raw: {    "method": "DeleteVolumes",    "params": {        "volumeIDs": [<Optional CSV List of Volume IDs>],        "accountIDs": [<Optional CSV List of Account IDs: All Volumes from These Accounts are Deleted>],        "volumeAccessGroupIDs": [<Optional CSV List of Volume Access Group IDs: all Volumes from These Volume Access Groups are Deleted>]    },    "id": 1}

request.description: Mark one or more volumes for removal from the system.

body.raw: {    "method": "DeleteVolumeAccessGroup",    "params": {        "volumeAccessGroupID": <Volume Access Group ID>,        "deleteOrphanInitiators": <Delete Initator Objects When Removed from Volume Access Group: Boolean true or false>,        "force": <Boolean true or false>    },    "id": 1}

request.description: Retrieve efficiency information about a Virtual Volume storage container.
Retrieve the number of Virtual Volumes currently in the system.
Retrieve the number of volumes currently in the system.
List initiator IQNs or WWPNs in the system.
Retrieve information about all protocol endpoints in the cluster.
Retrieve information about all protocol endpoints in the cluster.
Retrieve information about all Virtual Volume storage containers known to the system.
List the Virtual Volumes currently in the system.
List all Virtual Volumes in the cluster that are bound to protocol endpoints.
List all Virtual Volume hosts known to the cluster.
List all Virtual Volume tasks in the system.
List volume statistics for Virtual Volumes.

body.raw: {    "method": "ModifyBackupTarget",    "params": {        "backupTargetID": <Backup Target ID>,        "name": "<Optional New Backup Target Name>",        "attributes": {<Optional Updated Backup Target Parameters>}    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "ModifyGroupSnapshot",    "params": {        "groupSnapshotID": <Group Snapshot ID>,        "enableRemoteReplication": <Optional Boolean true or false>,        "expirationTime": "<Optional amount of time to retain the snapshot in ISO 8601 format>"    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "ModifyInitiators",    "params": {        "initiators": [        	{        		"initiatorID": <Initiator ID>,        		"alias": "<Optional Friendly Name for Initiator>",        		"attributes": {},        		"volumeAccessGroupID": <Optional New Volume Access Group ID for Initiator>        	}        ]    },    "id": 1}

request.description: Change the attributes of one or more existing initiators.

body.raw: {    "method": "ModifyQoSPolicy",    "params": {    	"qosPolicyID": <QoS Policy ID>,        "name": "<Optional Name of QoS Policy>",        "qos": {            "minIOPS": <Optional Minimum IOPS>,            "maxIOPS": <Optional Maximum IOPS>,            "burstIOPS": <Optional Burst IOPS>        }    },    "id": 1}

request.description: Change the attributes of one or more existing initiators.

body.raw: {    "method": "ModifySchedule",    "params": {        "attributes": {            "frequency": "<One of: Time Interval, Days of Week, Days of Month>"        },        "hours": <Optional Hours between snapshots, used for Time Interval mode>,        "minutes": <Optional Minutes between snapshots, used for Time Interval mode>,        "paused": <Optional Boolean true or false>,        "recurring": <Optional Boolean true or false>,        "runNextInterval": <Optional Boolean true or false>,        "scheduleID": <The ID of the schedule being modified>,        "scheduleName": "<Name for the schedule>",        "scheduleType": "snapshot",        "scheduleInfo": {            "volumeID": <Volume ID to be snapped>,            "volumes": [<CSV List of Volume IDs to be group snapped>],            "name": "<Name of the snapshot>",            "enableRemoteReplication": <Boolean true or false>            "retention": "<Optional amount of time to retain the snapshot in HH:mm:ss>"        },        "startingDate": "<Optional Starting Date in ISO 8601 Format>",        "toBeDeleted": <Optional Boolean true or false>,        "monthdays": [<Optional CSV List of days to run>],        "weekdays": [            {"day": <Day Number>, "offset": 1},            {"day": <Day Number>, "offset": 1}        ]    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "ModifySnapshot",    "params": {        "snapshotID": <Snapshot ID>,        "enableRemoteReplication": <Optional Boolean true or false>,        "expirationTime": "<Optional amount of time to retain the snapshot in ISO 8601 format>"    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "ModifyStorageContainer",    "params": {        "storageContainerID": <Storage Container ID>,        "initiatorSecret": "<Optional CHAP Secret for Initiator>",        "targetSecret": "<Optional CHAP Secret for Target>"       	        }    },    "id": 1}

request.description: Make changes to an existing Virtual Volume storage container.

body.raw: {    "method": "ModifyVolume",    "params": {        "volumeID": <Volume ID>,        "accountID": <Optional New Account ID for Volume>,        "totalSize": <Optional New Volume Size in Bytes>,        "setCreateTime": <true to Set New Creation Time for the Volume>,        "createTime": "<Optional New Creation Time for the Volume if setCreateTime is true>",        "access": "<Optional Allowed Access for the Volume: One of readOnly, readWrite, locked, replicationTarget>",        "attributes": {},        "qos": {            "minIOPS": <Optional Minimum IOPS>,            "maxIOPS": <Optional Maximum IOPS>,            "burstIOPS": <Optional Burst IOPS>,            "burstTime": 60        },        "qosPolicyID": <Optional QoS Policy ID>    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "ModifyVolumes",    "params": {        "volumeID": [<CSV List of Volume IDs to Modify>],        "accountID": <Optional New Account ID for Volumes>,        "totalSize": <Optional New Volume Size in Bytes>,        "setCreateTime": <true to Set New Creation Time for the Volumes>,        "createTime": "<Optional New Creation Time for the Volumes if setCreateTime is true>",        "access": "<Optional Allowed Access for the Volumes: One of readOnly, readWrite, locked, replicationTarget>",        "attributes": {},        "qos": {            "minIOPS": <Optional Minimum IOPS>,            "maxIOPS": <Optional Maximum IOPS>,            "burstIOPS": <Optional Burst IOPS>,            "burstTime": 60        },        "qosPolicyID": <Optional QoS Policy ID>    },    "id": 1}

request.description: Change the configuration of one or more volumes at a time.

body.raw: {    "method": "ModifyVolumeAccessGroup",    "params": {        "volumeAccessGroupID": <Volume Access Group ID>,        "name": "<Optional Volume Access Group Name>",        "initiators": [            <CSV List of Initiator IDs (integers) or Quoted IQNs or WWPNs (strings, deprecated)>        ],        "deleteOrphanInitiators": <Delete initiator objects After Removal from Volume Access Group: true or false>,        "volumes": [            <Optional CSV List of Volume IDs>        ],        "attributes": {}    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "ModifyVolumeAccessGroupLunAssignments",    "params": {        "volumeAccessGroupID": <Volume Access Group ID>,        "lunAssignments": [            { "volumeID": <Volume ID>, "lun": <LUN ID> },            { "volumeID": <Volume ID>, "lun": <LUN ID> },            { "volumeID": <Volume ID>, "lun": <LUN ID> }        ]    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "ModifyVolumePair",    "params": {        "volumeID": <Volume ID>,        "pausedManual": <Boolean true or false>,        "mode": "<Volume Replication Mode: Async, Sync, or SnapshotsOnly>"    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "PurgeDeletedVolumes",    "params": {        "volumeIDs": [<Optional List of Volume IDs to Purge>],        "accountIDs": [<Optional List of Account IDs to Purge From>],        "volumeAccessGroupIDs": [<Optional list of Volume Access Group IDs to Purge From>]    },    "id": 1}

request.description: Immediately and permanently purges volumes that have been marked for deletion.

body.raw: {    "method": "RemoveInitiatorsFromVolumeAccessGroup",    "params": {        "volumeAccessGroupID": <Volume Access Group ID>,        "initiators": [<CSV List of Initiator IDs (integers) or Quoted IQNs or WWPNs (strings, deprecated)>],        "deleteOrphanInitiators": <Delete initiator objects After Removal from Volume Access Group: true or false>    },    "id": 1}
{    "method": "RemoveVolumesFromVolumeAccessGroup",    "params": {        "volumeAccessGroupID": <Volume Access Group ID>,        "volumes": [<CSV List of Volume IDs>]    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "RollbackToGroupSnapshot",    "params": {        "groupSnapshotID": <Group Snapshot ID>,        "name": "<Optional Group Snapshot Name if Saving State>",        "saveCurrentState": <Boolean true or false>,        "attributes": {}    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "RollbackToSnapshot",    "params": {        "volumeID": <Volume ID>,        "snapshotID": <Snapshot ID>,        "name": "<Optional Name for the Snapshot if Saving State>",        "saveCurrentState": <Boolean true or false>,        "attributes": {}    },    "id": 1}

request.description: Configure the default Quality of Service (QoS) values for a volume.

body.raw: {    "method": "StartBulkVolumeRead",    "params": {        "volumeID": <Volume ID>,        "format": "<Either native or uncompressed>",        "snapshotID": <Snapshot ID>,        "script": "<Optional script name>",        "scriptParameters": <JSON Formatted Script Parameters>,        "attributes": {}    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "StartBulkVolumeWrite",    "params": {        "volumeID": <Volume ID>,        "format": "<Either native or uncompressed>",        "script": "<Optional script name>",        "scriptParameters": <JSON Formatted Script Parameters>,        "attributes": {}    },    "id": 1}
{    "method": "StartVolumePairing",    "params": {        "volumeID": <Volume ID>,        "mode": "<Volume Replication Mode: Async, Sync, or SnapshotsOnly>"    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "UpdateBulkVolumeStatus",    "params": {        "key": "<Bulk Volume Job Key>",        "status": "<Bulk Volume Job Status>",        "percentComplete": "<Optional Percent Complete>",        "message": "<Bulk Volume Job Status Message>",        "attributes": {}    },    "id": 1}
